metadata.notes: Abstract stone tablets with hieroglyphic-like symbols representing code/scripts

theme.concept: ancient stone tablets with abstract hieroglyphic symbols flowing into modern automation

colors.distribution: stone tablets in blue tones, carved symbols highlighted with orange accents, background fading to purple-gray

style.texture: weathered stone texture with carved indentations, subtle grain
style.aesthetic: contemporary minimalist abstract with ancient elements

elements.foreground: weathered stone tablets with carved abstract hieroglyphic-like symbols
elements.midground: symbols dissolving and flowing rightward into fluid patterns
elements.background: atmospheric blue gradient suggesting depth and transformation
